item.title: Week-2025-49
item.description:
Articles

  • The Unexpected poetry of PhD acknowledgements
  • “while still making seem like i wrote it”
  • The long march of electrification

Books

  • Dark Matter
  • Daemon

Music

  • Brent Faiyaz ft Trey Amanie : Price Of Fame

    You’ll have got to listen to how delicate Ego can ruin a lot for you!

  • Brent Faiyaz : JACKIE BROWN -

Note: While i don’t like the idea of youtube and spotify recap, it did give me a sense of who i’m becoming and i like it, ðŸ˜‚
